.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkPipelineCacheCreateInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_PIPELINE_CACHE_CREATE_INFO
* [[VUID-VkPipelineCacheCreateInfo-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL`
* [[VUID-VkPipelineCacheCreateInfo-flags-zerobitmask]] pname:flags must: be `0`
* [[VUID-VkPipelineCacheCreateInfo-pInitialData-parameter]] If pname:initialDataSize is not `0`, pname:pInitialData must: be a valid pointer to an array of pname:initialDataSize bytes
****
